title: Postcards FS Red Sox Young Lord Stahl Williams Yaz
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: Postcards FS Red Sox Young Lord Stahl Williams Yaz
posts.post_content:
MOVED TO EBAY - Ebay id - Greenmonster

1912 Boston American Series Jake Stahl, crease and small paper loss top left, corner staining on back, unused -

1909 Cy Young on his hunting horse Rambo, corner wear, no creases 

1910 PC796 Sepia Postcard Harry Lord, top left corner crease, corner wear - SOLD

1939-1946-Salutation Exhibit-Supply Ted-Williams #9 - corner wear, no creases 
  
1939-1946-Salutation Exhibit-Supply Ted-Williams no number - corner wear, no creases, light pencil writing on back top left corner -

C1970 Yaz signed team issue color postcard - nice signature, no card creases - 

C1940s Real Photo Postcard signed, Dom DiMaggio - beautiful image and signature - possibly Burke image - RDM Studios back -
I want to buy the Lord Sepia PC. Thanks!
